clir.control.query

Class QueryHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • clir.control.query.QueryHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrossLanguageQueryHandler, LSAQueryHandler, PerLanguageQueryHandler

    public class QueryHandler
extends Object
    Abstract super-class where common attributes and operations of an Per-language, Cross-Language and Latent Semantic Query Handlers, can be placed.
    Author:
    Gabriel
